name: wis-cli
description: The wis design cli build tools

scripts.alpha: pnpm changeset pre enter alpha && pnpm run version && pnpm changeset pre exit
scripts.beta: pnpm changeset pre enter beta && pnpm run version && pnpm changeset pre exit
scripts.rc: pnpm changeset pre enter rc && pnpm run version && pnpm changeset pre exit
scripts.release: pnpm changeset tag && git push --follow-tags && pnpm publish -r
